attributes.action: Bring in annual blood test for PSA levels in men over 45
attributes.additional_details: Men deserve the right for cancer checks the same as women
attributes.background: Put PSA testing for men on the same level as smear and breast screening for women, help find prostrate cancer early in men and save lives .

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/615500

If you'd like a similar petitions that would offer the tests from the age of 45 (or a different age over 45) we could accept that petition.
